name: Zone:Zero
description:
This was a group project. My friends, Sydney, Ransom, and Susie, made this game. I handled the coding and they handled the asset design. This is our first (and hopefully NOT last) game that we've made. If you find any bugs or have any suggestions, please leave a comment. We would appreciate some constructive criticism. Thanks, and have fun!

You think you're finished with the game? FALL!
